Loginova Maria

22 Brown Circle · Fredericksburg, VA 22405 · (571) 466-6029 · ml2089@georgetown.edu

I am a results-oriented and driven first-year MBA candidate at Georgetown McDonough Business School with a passion for data-based business decisions, high consumer satisfaction, and innovation. Prior to my MBA worked in Brand Management and Digital in the CPG industry as well as helped developing two international EdTech Start-ups. I thrive in fast-paced environments that allow utilizing my strengths of strategic thinking, project management, and interpersonal skills. Please, do not hesitate to reach out to me about interesting brand management and tech marketing opportunities.

Experience

Junior Brand Manager, Marketing Department

PepsiCo
  • Executed launch of two innovative healthy yogurt products as a part of long-term growth strategy that resulted in YTD volume growth of 123% vs plan.
  • Took ownership over the break-through digital personalization project "Mr. Procrastination", first of a kind digital project on Russian market for PepsiCo, nominated as one of best digital campaigns in PepsiCo Russia 2020.
  • Coordinated complex cross-functional projects with Sales, R&D, Insights, Commercialization, and Finance on development of anti-crisis holistic action plan on more than 20 projects.
  • Orchestrated re-launch of value brand Frugurt, leveraging product formula optimization, package and redesign, price policy step-change to win over fast-growing value segment, yielding volume growth of 49% vs the prior year.
  • Performed regular quantitative data analyses of various markets and competitors to identify market trends and dynamics, segmentation and brand positioning insights for strategic product decision-making.
  • Initiated portfolio optimization strategy to raise profitability of 2 dairy brands, including new formulas, product termination, revised budget; resulted in a significant increase in profitability.
July 2020 - August 2021

Senior Digital Associate, LDP in Digital Department

PepsiCo
  • Appointed to lead biggest strategic eCommerce client, Ozon (Amazon of Russia). Later offered Account manager position for 3 key eCommerce clients, including Ozon and Wildberries.
  • Managed digital launch of Doritos brand in Russian market, including digital promotion, PR, bloggers support, and special projects with celebrities, resulting in growth of Instagram 70 times vs initial.
  • Led project management for Lay's 360 New Year campaign. TikTok challenge results exceeded plan by 76% and advertising copy reach exceeded plan by 23%. Campaign cited as one of the best cases in Europe.
  • Orchestrated re-launch of value brand Frugurt, leveraging product formula optimization, package and redesign, price policy step-change to win over fast-growing value segment, yielding volume growth of 49% vs the prior year.
  • Championed digital campaigns for Snacks category including Lay's, Doritos, Hrusteam, and Cheetos. Managed creative agencies, budget, campaigns evaluation, and website development.
  • Designed unique Social Media Listening analytical reporting architecture, initiated and conducted extensive educational trainings for 70+ employees, conducted coaching sessions on digital platforms for marketing teams.
  • Introduced digital campaign evaluation KPIs, launched and produced monthly business reports.
September 2019 - July 2020

Full-Time Trainee, Category Management Department

Danone
  • Executed and delivered deep dive analysis of modern dairy brands performance and market trends based on Nielsen database; leveraged analysis to develop category insights and best practices for the teams across the company.
  • Introduced category management playbook with strategic market analysis, trends and consumer insights for sales and marketing teams.
July 2018 - December 2018

Volunteering Experiences

Social Impact Analyst

AB InBev

Invited judge of the campaigns at the 5th annual Smart Drinking Social Norms Marketing competition. Core role - analyze the social marketing campaigns of the participants. The campaigns are designed to promote Smart Drinking campaigns globally that can have a lasting impact on social norms to encourage moderation and reduce harmful consumption.

April 2023 - May 2023

Marketing and Strategy Manager

Stubie

Developed marketing strategy for startup roll-out on the global markets. Stubie's team is comprised of professionals coming from different fields, but with a common goal – helping future international students to find the best path to reach their educational dreams. Stubie have created the platform where freelance study-abroad consultants and applicants can easily get connected.

December 2021 - July 2022

Marketing Manager

DOTS

Developed marketing strategy for 4 markets, product experience and market research. DOTS is a young international startup focused on providing additional experiential learning opportunities around the world.

October 2020 - March 2021

Interests

Apart from being a marketer, I got lots of hobbies and interests – travelling is the biggest passion of mine! In general, I prefer to spend all the time outside in the nature, love mountaineering, tennis, hiking and climbing. In the winter, I am an avid skier and ice skater. Also, I got a PADI certificate, and love exploring the underwater world.

Choosing from mostly indoor activities, I am really keen on yoga, meditation, and learning foreign languages as well as expanding my knowledge of foreign countries.

Tennis is an amazing sport, especially if you can play outdoors.

A bit of yoga and meditation in the nature help to reduce the stress from all the b school workload!
